hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo "Delivery Step" echo "-------------" echo "- rsync -carv --safe-links /opt/cie/jenkins/jobs/dai-cip-NightlyBuild-2.0.0/workspace/dai-cip-ws/target/dist/dia-cip-sender.tar.gz tcserver@dvappdai05:/opt/tcserver/dai-cip"
rsync -carv --safe-links /opt/cie/jenkins/jobs/dai-cip-NightlyBuild-2.0.0/workspace/dai-cip-ws/target/dist/dia-cip-sender.tar.gz tcserver@dvappdai05:/opt/tcserver/dai-cip
echo "Deploy Steps" echo "------------" echo "- ssh tcserver@dvappdai05" echo "- cd /opt/tcserver/dai-cip" echo "- rm -fr old_cipapp" echo "- mv cipapp old_cipapp" echo "- tar xzf dia-cip-sender.tar.gz" echo "- rm dia-cip-sender.tar.gz" echo "- cd old_cipapp/config" echo "- cp cipupdate.properties ../../cipapp/config"
ssh tcserver@dvappdai04 "cd /opt/tcserver/dai-cip; rm -fr old_cipapp; mv cipapp old_cipapp; tar xzf dia-cip-sender.tar.gz; rm dia-cip-sender.tar.gz; cd old_cipapp/config; cp cipupdate.properties ../../cipapp/config"
